text: Jordi Rebellón López (15 February 1957 - 8 September 2021) was a Spanish actor. He was known for his role as Rodolfo Vilches in popular television series Hospital Central. Rebellón was born in Barcelona, Spain. His career began in 1988. Rebellón died on 8 September 2021 in Madrid, Spain of a stroke, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Actors from Barcelona
title: Jordi Rebellón
